The game has awesome tournaments and bosses, extremely exciting gameplay. I recommend it to everyone. I've already played 3,000 hours and don't regret a single minute!!

фвафуац
ㅤ
It's the best screenshot app;  it's a must-have for every personal computer . God bless you, whoever is reading this .
The game has awesome tournaments and bosses, extremely exciting gameplay. I recommend it to everyone. I've already played 3,000 hours and don't regret a single minute!!

I was using this all the time before I discovered Windows 11's built-in snipping tool. Now, I use that almost exclusively, However, I can't ignore that this tool exists, so I'll write about it now.

ShareX has a lot of options, more so than most capture software. The fact that it is FREE and OPEN SOURCE is a big plus, and it does capture and record well. I do have some issues with it - trying to capture game footage sometimes doesn't work, as all it will produce is a black screen, but anymore I use OBS for that, as it seems to work better in capturing the screen without restrictions. With OBS, I can even capture a full-length movie protected by DRM - something ShareX is not fully capable of and easily blocked by desktop apps or website scripts.

Also, it has had issues in the past, which admittedly I have not tried it lately before writing this review, but I remember the recording feature not working very well. In fact, it would crash sometimes, something that I hope they've fixed since the last time I used this over a year ago. Yes, a lot can happen in a year's time, but you'd be surprised how many free, open source programs I used to use and left in frustration because of bugs, then came back to months (or even years) later and found that the very same issues had not been resolved.

I have managed to substitute ShareX's features with other programs like the GIMP, OBS, Audacity, and DaVinci Resolve, but it's still a nice program to have "just in case".
好用的截图软件，也可以录屏，不过我会用obs studio

Игра ShareX – это просто находка для тех, кто часто делится скриншотами или короткими видео. Программа абсолютно бесплатна и при этом обладает невероятно широким функционалом. Настройка горячих клавиш под любой вкус – отдельный плюс, позволяет мгновенно делать скриншоты нужных областей. Редактор изображений, встроенный в ShareX, хоть и не заменяет полноценный графический редактор, но всё-таки позволяет быстро добавить стрелки, текст, размытие или обвести важные детали.

Возможность загрузки изображений и видео на кучу различных хостингов – от Imgur до YouTube и облачных хранилищ – это вообще бомба! Забудьте про ручное копирование и вставку ссылок, ShareX сделает все за вас. Единственный минус, с которым я столкнулся, – это немного перегруженный интерфейс на первый взгляд. Но стоит потратить немного времени на изучение, и ShareX станет незаменимым инструментом в вашей работе. Рекомендую всем, кто ищет мощный и бесплатный инструмент для работы со скриншотами и видеозаписью экрана.

The best capture tool ever!
Although there are some features to figure out,after that, no problem!
в игре ахуенные турниры и боссы, максимально увлекательный геймплей, всем советую, наиграл уже 10 тысяч часов, не жалею не минуты
I had to stop using this program when I encountered the problem of recording the microphone .and system sounds at the same time, which this program does not allow, unlike OBS
Best tool for taking screenshots, my life changed when I discovered this app
Such a good app. Very usefull for makind screenshots.

negative.review: addictive af

Good app that I frequently use, however steams implementation leaves so much to be desired. Instead of instantly opening like it would if you just downloaded the standalone version, you get to wait on that steam loading window. If you have already opened sharex from steam and god forbid you closed the window and need the app again, you need to end the process in task manager before you can get Sharex on your screen again. Utterly dismal. Just download the app from the shareX site and forget about this garbage edition of such a good free and open source program.
Been using ShareX for a few years. As of recent, the program closes on itself after about 2-3 hours of idle time. No error logs or anything. Cannot reccomend.

Impossible to set up correctly on non-laptop setups and too complicated

No obvious Audio section that lets me distinguish between my mic and my system audio

Can't understand half the settings and all the YouTube guides are far too long and unhelpful

Requires too many third party programs and files to work
addictive af
dogshit interface
